DOC.brief_summary: Feasibility study randomize non-vigorous newborn infant bear meconium-stained amniotic fluid endotracheal suction immediate resuscitation .
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot feasibility trial endotracheal intubation suction versus routine resuscitation term , non-vigorous newborn bear meconium-stained amniotic fluid compare incidence meconium aspiration syndrome , extracorporeal membrane oxygenation death .
DOC.criteria: Term newborn ( > 37 week gestation ) Delivery meconiumstained amniotic fluid Mothers > 18 year age No consent mother Infant vigor delivery ( muscle tone respiratory effort ) Prenatally diagnosed major anomaly ( exclude gastroschisis ) Plan resuscitate infant Family speak English
